title: 0.14 requires extra configuration to typecheck with Flow
body:
If I create a brand new project directory, create a `.flowconfig`, `npm install react@0.14.0-beta3`, and type check a very simple file:

``` javascript
var React = require("react");
```

I am faced with a bunch of errors from `flow check`:

```
example/node_modules/react/node_modules/fbjs/flow/include/Deferred.js:39:15,15: return
Missing annotation

example/node_modules/react/node_modules/fbjs/flow/include/PromiseMap.js:15:16,34: Deferred
Required module not found

example/node_modules/react/node_modules/fbjs/flow/include/PromiseMap.js:17:17,36: invariant
Required module not found

example/node_modules/react/node_modules/fbjs/flow/include/fetchWithRetries.js:16:28,58: ExecutionEnvironment
Required module not found

example/node_modules/react/node_modules/fbjs/flow/include/fetchWithRetries.js:19:15,32: sprintf
Required module not found

example/node_modules/react/node_modules/fbjs/flow/include/fetchWithRetries.js:20:13,28: fetch
Required module not found

example/node_modules/react/node_modules/fbjs/flow/include/fetchWithRetries.js:21:15,32: warning
Required module not found
```

It's easy to work around: just add the following configuration to `.flowconfig`:

```
[ignore]
.*/react/node_modules/.*
```

This is exactly what the Relay project does. However, it'd be great if people could follow the steps from the beginning of this issue (create `.flowconfig`, `npm install react`) and have a more "turnkey" working system without any further required configuration.

Maybe this is a fbjs bug and not a React bug? I wasn't sure the best place to file this one, but if it belongs somewhere else I'm happy to redirect this.

Thanks!
